newsitem.title: UK: European bunkers steady, quiet due to holiday.
newsitem.headline: European bunkers steady, quiet due to holiday.

text.p: European bunker markets were extremely quiet on Thursday due to a holiday in many centres. Rotterdam prices were little changed, brokers said.
They assessed Rotterdam 380 cst at $86 a tonne and 180 cst at $92, and Antwerp prices at the same level or $1 higher.
Hamburg prices were about $5 above Antwerp at $92 and $97 respectively.
The Mediterranean market was dead with prices unchanged in most centres. At Fos, 380 cst was quoted at $90 and 180 cst at $96.
In Durban 180 cst was quoted at $94/98 a tonne.
